  1. å®šä¹‰çŠ¶æ€

  2. æ¨å¯¼çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹

    • dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j]+arr[i][j] æˆ– dp[i][j] = dp[i][j-1]+arr[i][j]

    • ä¸ºä½¿æ•°å­—æ€»å’Œæœ€å°ï¼Œæ”¹å†™ä¸º dp[i][j] = min(dp[i-1][j], dp[i][j-1])+arr[i][j]

  3. åˆå§‹åŒ–

    • dp[0][0] = arr[0][0]

    int minPathSum(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {
        int m = grid.size();
        int n = grid[0].size();
        vector<vector<int>> dp(m, vector<int>(n, 0));
    

        dp[0][0] = grid[0][0];
        for(int i=1; i<m; i++){
            dp[i][0] = dp[i-1][0] + grid[i][0];
        }
        for(int j=1; j<n; j++){
            dp[0][j] = dp[0][j-1] + grid[0][j];
        }
    

        for(int i=1; i<m; i++){
            for(int j=1; j<n; j++){
                dp[i][j] = min(dp[i-1][j], dp[i][j-1]) + grid[i][j];
            }
        }
    

        return dp[m-1][n-1];
    }
